description: A massive island-sized ship commanded by Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. The ship resembles a floating island and contains a mansion, forests, and graveyard. It serves as Moria's base for creating his zombie army.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Absalom Battle
keyEvents.description: Sanji battles Absalom in the ceremony hall, revealing his childhood dream and overwhelming the invisible man with furious attacks.
keyEvents.significance: Major character development moment for Sanji and intense battle.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Hits Moria
keyEvents.description: Luffy successfully hits Gecko Moria with Gomu Gomu no Stamp in the Mast Mansion area.
keyEvents.significance: First successful direct hit on the Warlord.

keyEvents.title: Ghost Princess Reveals Herself
keyEvents.description: Perona reveals herself as the Ghost Princess to Usopp in the mansion.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the upcoming Usopp vs Perona battle.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational and serving as Moria's base

name.japanese: スリラーバーク・式場

description: A large hall within Thriller Bark where Absalom attempted to force a wedding with Nami. The location becomes the battleground for Sanji's furious assault on Absalom.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Childhood Dream Revealed
keyEvents.description: Sanji reveals his childhood desire for the Clear-Clear Fruit in this location during his battle with Absalom.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Enraged Assault
keyEvents.description: Sanji unleashes a devastating barrage of attacks on Absalom while Nami remains unconscious.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's combat prowess and protective nature.

statusHistory.reason: Hall is being used for Absalom's forced wedding ceremony

name.japanese: スリラーバーク・マスト屋敷

description: The central mast area of Thriller Bark that contains mansion rooms. This is where Gecko Moria confronts Luffy, using his Doppelman shadow to battle.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Doppelman
keyEvents.description: Luffy struggles against Moria's shadow duplicate which transforms into Brick Bats to attack him.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the difficulty of fighting Moria's shadow abilities.

keyEvents.title: Gomu Gomu no Stamp Success
keyEvents.description: Luffy bypasses Doppelman and successfully hits Gecko Moria directly, kicking him through the floor.
keyEvents.significance: First solid hit on the Warlord, proving Luffy's tactical creativity.

statusHistory.reason: Location is being used for the battle between Luffy and Gecko Moria

name.japanese: スリラーバーク・屋敷

description: The main mansion structure on Thriller Bark with numerous rooms, corridors, and windows. This is where Usopp pursues Perona through the hallways.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Defeats Kumashi
keyEvents.description: Usopp uses fire attacks to defeat the zombie bear Kumashi in the mansion corridors.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's combat effectiveness against zombies.

keyEvents.title: Ghost Princess Appears
keyEvents.description: Perona reveals herself as the Ghost Princess while floating outside a window in astral projection form.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the Usopp vs Perona confrontation.

statusHistory.reason: Mansion is operational as part of Thriller Bark
